mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id, violation_date, violation_title, violation_type, agent_person, enclosure, operator, operator_ip, operator_time
mapper.insert: insert into supervision_enterprise_credit (id, enterprise_id, violation_date, violation_title, violation_type, agent_person, enclosure, operator, operator_ip, operator_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{violationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{violationTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{violationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update supervision_enterprise_credit
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
violation_date = #{violationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
violation_title = #{violationTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
violation_type = #{violationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_person = #{agentPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update supervision_enterprise_credit set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, violation_date = #{violationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, violation_title = #{violationTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, violation_type = #{violationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_person = #{agentPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.violation_date,b.violation_title,b.agent_person,b.violation_type FROM (select b.id ,b.enterprise_name,b.legal_person,b.cantact_way,COUNT(a.id) violation_number FROM supervision_enterprise as b LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise_credit as a on a.enterprise_id = b.id GROUP BY b.id) a LEFT JOIN (select enterprise_id,violation_date,violation_title,agent_person,violation_type from ( select enterprise_id,violation_date,violation_title,agent_person,violation_type,ROW_NUMBER()over(partition by enterprise_id order by violation_date desc) as disorder from supervision_enterprise_credit )t where t.disorder=1) b on a.id = b.enterprise_id ORDER BY b.violation_date DESC
limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT a.*,b.violation_date,b.violation_title,b.agent_person,b.violation_type FROM (select b.id ,b.enterprise_name,b.legal_person,b.cantact_way,b.operation_mode,b.id_number,b.business_address,COUNT(a.id) violation_number FROM supervision_enterprise as b LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise_credit as a on a.enterprise_id = b.id GROUP BY b.id) a INNER JOIN (select enterprise_id,violation_date,violation_title,agent_person,violation_type from ( select enterprise_id,violation_date,violation_title,agent_person,violation_type,ROW_NUMBER()over(partition by enterprise_id order by violation_date desc) as disorder from supervision_enterprise_credit )t where t.disorder=1) b on a.id = b.enterprise_id ORDER BY b.violation_date DESC
limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}

select count(1) from ( SELECT a.*,b.violation_date,b.violation_title,b.agent_person,b.violation_type FROM (select b.id ,b.enterprise_name,b.legal_person,b.cantact_way,COUNT(a.id) violation_number FROM supervision_enterprise as b LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise_credit as a on a.enterprise_id = b.id GROUP BY b.id) a
LEFT JOIN
INNER JOIN
(select enterprise_id,violation_date,violation_title,agent_person,violation_type from ( select enterprise_id,violation_date,violation_title,agent_person,violation_type,ROW_NUMBER()over(partition by enterprise_id order by violation_date desc) as disorder from supervision_enterprise_credit )t where t.disorder=1) b on a.id = b.enterprise_id ORDER BY b.violation_date DESC)as a
